name: Monster Rush
description:
If the game does not work in browser above you can still play an older version of it here

An isometric voxel survival shooter.

Shoot waves on enemies until you're lucky enough for one of the them to drop a torch.

Once you have the torch you can explore the maze of a cave and try your luck taking out the boss.

Gameplay trailer:

This game was made as part of our BSc games programing degree at Goldsmiths.

It was developed over 6 months by a team of four students.

It was showcased at Goldsmiths Computing Undergad Show 2016

It was also in the developer showcase at Intel Buzz Workshop London 2016
